data.message: Mark, thank you so much for such powerful words. Facebook family, thank you for helping our world be connected. I am a high school teacher and will play this speech for my students at the end of the year because I often find them questioning their strength, their purpose, and the reach of their goals. I know Mark's words are not a magic potion for them but they might be a small seed to keep going. Many thanks!!

replies.message: Thank you for these kind words, Blanca. We appreciate your support! Have a great day! -Caitlin

Facebook Hello, dear Facebook!
I have been writing for more than a month on your technical support. What do I need to do to be seen? Help me please solve my problem.
